reviewText: brings me back to my childhood

This show is so addictive! You have to keep watching it to see what is going to happen next!! Love Quinton! Barnabus  and the rest of the cast! The quality of acting is  awesome,they all really get into their characters!
The DVD collections are great and my husband and I enjoy catching up on our soaps from the 1970's. His parents' wouldn't let him watch the series as a child.
I now have the collection if the series and plan to buy the Dark Showdows movies done in the 70's. plus other old shows from my younger days.
These video's bring back my childhood when I watched this show with my mom. It's entertaining with it's hammy acting and fun to look for the mistakes in each episode. Cult Classic All the Way!
The start of the exceptional 1840 flashback. This was the last of great Dark Shadows storylines IMO. Audio and Video are good on all the episodes on this collection.
wish I wasn't coming up on the end of the show. I've seen episodes I really don't remember anything about.

After seeing what little respect Tim Burton and Johhny Depp had for the original in their movie. it's nice to have these DVD's Every night before sleep I crawl under the blankets and watch an episode ot two of the original series. It brings back memories of a simpler childhood life.
Excellent
This shoe is like crack! Extremely stupid yet highly addictive
I purchased this gift for my best friend and he was very pleased with the quality of the videos.
Love Dark Shadows !!
everything was GREAT.

My wife and I bought DVD Collection #5 on a lark and have worked our way all through the end of the series, we couldn't stop once we started. Some of the story lines dragged a bit (I'm being kind) but by and large they've kept us looking forward to the next one, and then the next one after that.

With this set, Collection #23, our intrepid cast heads into the 1840 story line which has to be up at the top since the 1797 storyline.... it has all your favorites of Angelique, Barnabas, Quentin, the marvelous Nancy Barrett, another evil Trask and enough villains to keep things hopping. I won't give away any surprises, but the writers did a great job of tying up all the loose ends of this great series in a slam-bang finish. Keep watching, fellow honorary residents of Collinsport - we are ready to start over and watch the series again!
Mom is very happy!
